lines.text: You owe me seven dollars man.
For teaching you how to dance sucker.

[Talking in the mirror, using a broomstick as a microphone]
I want, to thank you for this award. It's the recognition for my peers, it's all those agonizing days, teaching Ozone everything I know.
I don't want to stay, all night don't you? Why don't you, go out and sweep man?
Yeah, go out and sweep, kucklehead. Who are you anyway, Fred Astaire?
[dances to breakdance music, with the broom]
